name: Arkanoid NG
description:
This is a Breakout-type game implemented in TIC-80. You need TIC-80 in order to run or edit it. It’s vaguely based on the old MSX implementation.

  • Button B (X key) to start or reset
  • Button A (Z key) to release the ball
  • Joystick (or arrow keys) to move the bat
  • Mouse works on click
  • Button X (A key) to activate mouse-only
  • Button Y (S key) to deactivate mouse-only
